name: Riri App
description:
Riri is an app that enables you to copy text from Images, play copied text as audio, and also copy, share or delete the text.


Riri can be downloaded on Google Play store for free

play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tech.riri.androidApp



Riri was Developed by Rita Okonkwo ( ritaokonkwo6@gmail.com) and Designed by Princess Oviawe (oviaweprincess2000@gmail.com)
